senses.sense_definition: A quick, rough drawing that is not intended to be a finished work, often made to capture the basic idea or shape of something.

examples.text: The artist drew a quick <w>sketch</w> of the landscape before starting the painting.
She made a pencil <w>sketch</w> of the flower on a napkin.

senses.sense_definition: A short, often funny scene or play, usually performed as part of a variety show or comedy program.

examples.text: The actors performed a hilarious <w>sketch</w> about politicians during the show.
We watched a funny <w>sketch</w> show on television last night.

senses.sense_definition: A rough design, plan, or draft of a project or idea.

examples.text: The architect showed us a preliminary <w>sketch</w> of the new building.
He drew a rough <w>sketch</w> of the seating plan for the wedding.

senses.sense_definition: A brief description of a person, incident, or situation that gives a general overview.

examples.text: The author provided a brief biographical <w>sketch</w> of the main character.
I have to write a character <w>sketch</w> for my literature class.

senses.sense_definition: A humorous newspaper article that summarizes political events using satire and caricature.

examples.text: The journalist wrote a daily <w>sketch</w> covering the debates in parliament.
Her political <w>sketch</w> was known for its sharp wit and criticism.

senses.sense_definition: A formal specification of a mathematical structure described in terms of a graph and diagrams.

examples.text: The professor explained the concept of a <w>sketch</w> in category theory.
Students studied the formal <w>sketch</w> to understand the data type structure.

senses.sense_definition: To make a quick, rough drawing of something or someone.

examples.text: I like to sit in the park and <w>sketch</w> the trees.
He quickly <w>sketched</w> a map to show us the way.

senses.sense_definition: To describe something briefly without giving many details.

examples.text: She <w>sketched</w> out her plan for the new business venture.
The witness <w>sketched</w> the events of the accident for the police officer.

senses.sense_definition: Suspicious, dangerous, or of questionable quality.

examples.text: I would not go into that dark alley because it looks pretty <w>sketch</w>.
Meeting a stranger in an abandoned building sounds very <w>sketch</w> to me.
